definition: to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: Proposed Insured must be one of the Insured Person(s).
sentences.chinese: 投保人必须为其中一名受保人。

sentences.english: But when the policyholder is mortgages people, the situation should be different.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果投保人是抵押权人时，情况又有所不同。

sentences.english: Policy-holder is handing in before two years of cost, expenses expenses is larger.
sentences.chinese: 投保人在交费的前两年，费用开支较大。

sentences.english: What percentage of your professional services is subcontracted to others?
sentences.chinese: 投保人分出该业务的份额是多少？

sentences.english: Insurant can be same person with policy-holder .
sentences.chinese: 被保险人可以与投保人为同一人。

sentences.english: Policy-holder change is gone to other place, if ingoing ground already built system of social endowment insurance.
sentences.chinese: 投保人迁往外地，若迁入地已建立社会养老保险制度。

sentences.english: Accordingly, " insurance law " regulation, insurant or policy-holder can change beneficiary beneficiary.
sentences.chinese: 或者投保人可以变更受益人。

sentences.english: The premium hereunder shall be paid in a lump sum by the Applicant upon execution of this Contract.
sentences.chinese: 本合同的保险费由投保人在投保时一次交清。

sentences.english: The proposer must be aged 18 or above.
sentences.chinese: 投保人必须年满18岁或以上。

sentences.english: We have a right to expect ittoregulate properly and not mislead policyholders.
sentences.chinese: 我们有权利期望它正确监管并且不误导投保人。

sentences.english: The insurer indemnified the insured for the great losses.
sentences.chinese: 承保人赔偿了投保人的巨额损失。

sentences.english: A policyholder who suffers a loss files a claim with the insurance company .
sentences.chinese: 遭受损失的投保人向保险公司提出索赔。

sentences.english: Please note that this proposal form is being completed on behalf of all insureds.
sentences.chinese: 本投保申请书由投保人代所有被保险人完成。

sentences.english: The policy holder is the applicant for termination benefit.
sentences.chinese: 退保金的申请人是投保人。

sentences.english: The policy won't be effective until proposer makes full payment of premium before the start of the journey.
sentences.chinese: 投保人须在出发前投保并交付保费以保证计划生效。

sentences.english: PICC Property companies pay compensation to policyholders of the county bus station.
sentences.chinese: 事后，中保财产公司向投保人县汽车站支付赔偿款。
